localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Squat is also called full squat. It is one of the most complex and practiced movements in bodybuilding. It is also a movement in powerlifting competitions. This is an app that automatically records the number of squats through sensors.
blogPost.body: Squat is also called full squat. It is one of the most complex and practiced movements in bodybuilding. It is also a movement in powerlifting competitions. This is an app that automatically records the number of squats through sensors.
blogPost.title: Daily Squat Workout App - Fitness app to track your squat workout
blogPost.author: Nine

localize.description: 蹲式也叫全蹲。它是健美比赛中最复杂、练习量最大的动作之一。它也是力量举比赛中的一个动作。这是一款通过传感器自动记录下蹲次数的应用。
localize.tagline: 追踪你的下蹲训练的健身应用

localize.description: 蹲式也叫全蹲。它是健美比賽中最複雜、練習量最大的動作之一。它也是力量舉比賽中的一個動作。這是一款通過傳感器自動記錄下蹲次數的應用。
localize.tagline: 追蹤你的下蹲訓練的健身應用

previous.excerpt: ⚡ The Hashnode Blog Cards is a set of GET requests which will fetch the Blogs from your Hashnode ids with few parameters and will create SVG cards to bring 😎 awesomeness to your blog links. 🎉 Github link https://github.com/Souravdey777/HashnodeBlogCards
previous.title: Hashnode Blog Cards - Replace your Hashnode Blog links with Blogs Cards.

localize.description: ⚡ Hashnode博客卡是一组GET请求，它将通过少量参数从你的Hashnode ids中获取博客，并将创建SVG卡，为你的博客链接带来😎惊艳。🎉 Github 链接 https://github.com/Souravdey777/HashnodeBlogCards
localize.tagline: 将您的Hashnode博客链接替换为博客卡。

localize.description: ⚡ Hashnode博客卡是一組GET請求，它將通過少量參數從你的Hashnode ids中獲取博客，並將創建SVG卡，爲你的博客鏈接帶來😎驚豔。🎉 Github 鏈接 https://github.com/Souravdey777/HashnodeBlogCards
localize.tagline: 將您的Hashnode博客鏈接替換爲博客卡。

next.excerpt: With Batch Styler editing multiple styles in Figma becomes way easier: Change all your color & typography styles at once, changing details like hue or font family within seconds.
next.title: Batch Styler for Figma - Change multiple Color / Text Styles at once

localize.description: 有了Batch Styler，在Figma中编辑多种风格变得更加容易。一次性改变所有的颜色和排版风格，在几秒钟内改变色调或字体系列等细节。
localize.tagline: 一次性改变多种颜色/文字风格

localize.description: 有了Batch Styler，在Figma中編輯多種風格變得更加容易。一次性改變所有的顏色和排版風格，在幾秒鐘內改變色調或字體系列等細節。
localize.tagline: 一次性改變多種顏色/文字風格
